translated: Elder’s Birth Stories🔽. The Chapter about the Water Seat
“Not having faith in my own craft,
I gave a gift of mangoes.
I do not know of a bad destination,
this is the fruit of the gift of mangoes.
The Buddha’s instruction has been carried out.”🔽Thus the elder Ambayāgadāyaka recited these verses.

original: Itthaṁ sudaṁ āyasmā ambayāgadāyako thero imā gāthāyo abhāsitthāti.🔽Ambayāgadāyakattherassāpadānaṁ aṭṭhamaṁ.
analyzed: ittham sudam āyasmai ambayāgadāyakaḥ theraḥ imāḥ gāthāyaḥ abhāsittha ati 🔽ambayāgadāyaka therassa apadānam aṭṭhama
translated: The Elder Ambayāgadāyaka’s Birth Story is the eighth.
